website_summaries.verdict: With its uncomplicated and no-nonsense design, the Puma Carson 2 was a winner for most of its users. They were happy with its simple features and their capacity to deliver a performance expected from a brand they trust. It touted to satisfy the needs of an everyday runner who isn’t looking for extravagant wear.
pros: Many users were happy with the shoe’s affordability and decent quality
It provided the perfect amount of arch support for neutral pronators, as mentioned by a purchaser
It was comfortable enough to wear even for daily use, stated a consumer
The midsole delivered well, and running felt like stepping on the clouds, wrote a reviewer
One user commented about the shoe’s considerable ankle support
Several wearers found the upper to be very breathable and snug on foot
The cushioning was found to be plush and not at all bulky or substantial
cons: A user commented that the shoe was too stiff and not as durable as expected
The fit is a bit tight and uncomfortable, according to a wearer
The shoe felt flimsy and unable to support running or any similar physical activities, a buyer complained
The outsole was criticized because it lost all its grip in less than a month of use

customer_reviews.title: They held up really well in all conditions and fit perfect as the size is true to the number
customer_reviews.text: I wore Puma's for 20 years playing soccer. They held up really well in all conditions and fit perfect as the size is true to the number. I ordered these hoping these were going to fit the same and continue to live up to the legend the brand has been to me for so many years. Once again, not an ounce of disappointment in my purchase. The fit it is true, they are very lightweight and only time will tell how well they hold up. But I have to be honest, these bad boys are getting worn a LOT so if they don't hold up I'll know in short order! I absolutely love how great they feel on my feet!
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Love Pumas
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. No animal materials. Perfectly acceptable in a business casual environment and super comfortable. Checks all the boxes fur me. I have a few Puma styles that check these boxes. I love every pair I have. The quality is excellent also, I wear them regularly and they look the same as when I first bought them (that’s true of all my pumas too not just these). I’m a big fan.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Johnson

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable...
customer_reviews.text: I probably have 3 pairs of this shoes. The very first one I bought from the store. I loved it because it's very comfortable and the quality is as expected of Puma. So, I went online and found some more of it here in Amazon and in different combination of colors. I see a lot of healthcare workers wearing this shoes and they feel the same way as I do...It's comfy!!
customer_reviews.author: Enecremw

customer_reviews.title: A very good stylish shoe with great comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for me. Very comfortable with a larger toe box for comfort. I have used the Carson 2 shoe before and have always liked its style, colors and most important, comfort. A very good stylish shoe!!!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made tumors and I own a lot of pairs of them trust me when I tell you this is one of the worst pairs of PUMA’s that I have ever bought. Period!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pvt.Mike Barone

customer_reviews.title: Some discomfort if laced properly
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes since I owned a similar pair in the past. Only thing that is noticeable after first day of use, the side rubs against the joint of my pinky toe if laces are tight. I decided to use them loose to avoid this discomfort. Besides that no complaints, love the design !
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Takes a beaten well.
customer_reviews.text: I use these primarily for running/jumprope, and I gotta say they feel way more comfortable than the pricetag would suggest not to mention they have torn one bit in the 2 months I've been using them almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice shoes, SUPER light weight!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice shoe, runs about 1/2 size smaller. usually wear a 10, but read size and fitment charts for Puma, and the euro size, and compared to other shoes, so purchased 10 1/2, and fit is perfect! Shoes are ridiculously light and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: best quality at this price range
customer_reviews.text: classic look, comfortable, size as stated, nothing to complain at this price
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great overall shoe. These fit slightly smaller than normal but not by much. I usually wear a solid 11 and these fit just slightly shorter than a normal 11 for me but are very comfortable especially with the way the toe area is crafted. Remember, if you order the Puma White the color is really a light tan/grey. The shoe is lightweight but has a fairly solid feel and is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy these and then buy these again
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe super light and comfortable. I have owned a few pairs and plan on continually replacing my current pair as the years go on.
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: Nice pair!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a temporary replacement for my old shoes because I moved. I've been wearing them ever since, and I'm well moved in for a couple months now.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Favorite shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my partner. He has been wearing the Puma Carson Runner for years.They are his shoes of choice.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Go up a half size
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, and very comfortable. Husband usually wears a 9 Med. and had to go up to 9.5 and the new size fit perfectly, so as the price is very reasonable, we ordered the new size and received it today, and he is very happy with the comfortable fit now, it made all the difference for him. Hope this is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: JMR

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Added these Carson 2's to my ever growing Puma sneaker collection. Fits great, very comfortable. Only change I would make is a black colored sole instead of the white one. IMO, that would make them look alot better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I have more than one pair of these. Mostly wear them around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Socks349

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, runs small
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, runs small. I usually wear 10.5 to 11.0 in US sizes. Bought this in a 11.5. Fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: SHY

customer_reviews.title: Order normal size you wear.
customer_reviews.text: Website said to order half size larger. Didn’t fit my husband who normally wears a 10.5, but fit my son who wears an 11.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: order one half size larger
customer_reviews.text: Although they are slightly small for me (10.5) they are extremely comfortable and easy to wear/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoes! Very stylish, got them for my husband for a bday gift and he absolutely loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Spartanalum1

customer_reviews.title: Bold look, comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Lightest and most comfortable shoes I’ve ever owned. Have a pair in blue, saw these and had to have them.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin G

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and feels comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe my friend wears them All the time now.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable, great traction on snow and ice, they felt broke in brand new, I have arthritis is both feet and the softfoam insoles are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Loved Them!
customer_reviews.text: They feel great. I didn’t like other colors were out of stock and I couldn’t buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Long

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable but quality so so...
customer_reviews.text: I liked how comfortable these were. However, after less than 2 months of wearing them for only walking to and from work (~1 mile each day), the stitches that hold the black puma stripe to the shoe is already falling apart. Quality leaves a bit to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for being on your feet all the time.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is on his feet all the time has four of these shoes. Good shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Feels great, but the stripes came off after a week.
customer_reviews.text: After a week of indoor use, two of the four stripes came loose. Apparently they are not glued well. Otherwise, quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh N. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Never disappoints me. My feet never hurt when I have these on. I have been wearing these shoes for about 2 years now. I have to get new ones about every 5-6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: I expected better quality for the price and the brand
customer_reviews.text: Had since april 3rd and as of april 28th the inside of the shoes are torn and ripped up. I expected better quality for the price and the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: good for jogging
customer_reviews.text: I like thin sole shoes. This one meet the demand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Picture of item was the color I wanted but I received a different color. Would like to exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Carruth

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pair of shoes! I tend bar so I'm on my feet quite a bit and these are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Carson all day!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes 10.5 fits perfect. Puma all day,! Fast shipment!!!!! 5 stars A++++++
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe! Has a memory sole, which is super comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Kimes

customer_reviews.title: Shoes run about a half a size small
customer_reviews.text: Everything regarding the transaction was top notch. I couldn’t have known that those shoes ran about a half a size small. Besides that, everyone involved were great!
customer_reviews.author: rebeca

customer_reviews.title: All Black Pumas
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and fit exactly how they described. Very satisfied and would do business again
customer_reviews.author: Chris Richards

customer_reviews.title: Great airflow, but still quite water resistant
customer_reviews.text: Quite a bit more water resistant than I had expected, running on damp tarmac or even spilling some Gatorade didn’t make my socks wet at all!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: A light weight and very comfortable pair of kicks, i really like them, i normally wear a size 9.5 but these seem a bit close so i might return them for a size 10.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite pairs of shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very good comfortable and well made for the price. I’ll probably get another pair of these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Came as described in Puma box!! Will buy again for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Lily J

customer_reviews.title: Pumas are a great sneaker!!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes!!! Very comfy and fit well. Look great too!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable, worried about durability
customer_reviews.text: the look exceeded my expectations, very comfortable, worried about durability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair in the store and had to get a second pair because they are so light and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: gorgeous shoes and super comfortable. love the fit and feel of them
customer_reviews.text: gorgeous shoes and super comfortable. love the fit and feel of them. am very tempted to buy another pair before they run out.
customer_reviews.author: Clark L.

customer_reviews.title: Mint!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price my feet dont hurt at the end of the day so that's a plus
customer_reviews.author: delbert Kyle baney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoes. Perfect Running shoes for the gym with excellent foam.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian Tadeo

customer_reviews.title: Freakishly Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: OMG. Your feet will love you. These shoes are Sooooo comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amy P Nuesslein

customer_reviews.title: will prob ably fit better than the 10 would have
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size 10, received size 9. Since I have a narrow foot and the shoe is mostly fabric, I can wear it with a liner and after it is broken in, will prob ably fit better than the 10 would have, I would advise a 9 1/2 to someone with a narrow foot/heel. Hopefully, you will receive the correct size!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Reay

customer_reviews.title: Compared to Reebok Ultraknit they feel and look cheap and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Compared to Reebok Ultraknit they feel and look cheap and flimsy
customer_reviews.author: uzevla

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Carson 2 Sneaker
product_meta.description: Style meets performance in the Carson 2 new core. The upper has been updated with a stylish new core material. Softfoam footbed elevates comfort while the ground contact eva outsole ensures a lighter weight while still providing the grip you need.
